channel.title: [PI] Itemdef2 [InsidiaX]
channel.description:
Hey ppl, oke so i got a problem when u try to open the skill cape shop, the client freeze cuz the hunter cape model is corrupted.
so i want to delete/replace it. so what i want to di is searshing the models in itemdef2 at the Ints, but then i couldnt find itemdef2 only itemdef.class/java and itemdef2.class but no itemdef2.java
so i searshed all folders, putted on show hidden folders, compiled it.
but still cant find the itemdef2 so anyone knows anything i will repp++

item.title: [PI] Itemdef2 [InsidiaX]
item.dc:creator: @RS2BullDog RS2BullDog
item.description:
@RS2BullDog wrote:

Decompile the .class file so you get the .java file and then copying it to a new document and save as that file youdecompiled.java then you will have the java version of it

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Itemdef2 [InsidiaX]
item.dc:creator: @hortblade hortblade
item.description:
@hortblade wrote:

i did deleted the hunter cape at my client, and still freezing

@edit ok i found a way for temporary solution, the problem is something with cash, so go to Insidia Source RELEASE\src\server\model\shops\shopassistant.java and search for ‘public void skillBuy’ then delete the following lines

if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,99000)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 99000);
} else { c.sendMessage("You need 99k to buy this item."); }

then compile it

the capes will cost 0 gps but you’ll be able to open the shop and buy then!

i hope i helped you!

Read full topic
